channel.title: Starting items
channel.description:
ive searched...
nothing came up on this
i need to know how to change the items you log in with
and it needs to be a 1 time thing
its for devolution 6.0
id like to put 100k
in ppls inventories
when they log in for the first time
=D
k
thx
=]

item.title: Starting items
item.dc:creator: @mydr3am mydr3am
item.description:
@mydr3am wrote:

No it wont if u done that right.

Read full topic

item.title: Starting items
item.dc:creator: @kiwon kiwon
item.description:
@kiwon wrote:

[quote=“Sharkboy2222, post:4, topic:161197”]i no how to fix it

go to player.java

search for

playerItems[0] = 1292; playerItemsN[0] = 1; playerItems[1] = 1172; playerItemsN[1] = 1;

example if u want full iron u find it in the item list then add 1 to the noted slot or w/e like this

playerItems[0] = 1154; playerItemsN[0] = 1; playerItems[1] = 1116; playerItemsN[1] = 1; playerItems[2] = 1068; playerItemsN[2] = 1; playerItems[3] = 1192; playerItemsN[3] = 1; playerItems[4] = 1310; playerItemsN[4] = 1;[/quote]thx but on dodian

sometimes when u log on

u get bronze long and wooden shield again

will that keep doing that?

Read full topic

item.title: Starting items
item.dc:creator: @Sharkboy2222 Sharkboy2222
item.description:
@Sharkboy2222 wrote:

i no how to fix it

go to player.java

search for

playerItems[0] = 1292; playerItemsN[0] = 1; playerItems[1] = 1172; playerItemsN[1] = 1;

example if u want full iron u find it in the item list then add 1 to the noted slot or w/e like this

playerItems[0] = 1154; playerItemsN[0] = 1; playerItems[1] = 1116; playerItemsN[1] = 1; playerItems[2] = 1068; playerItemsN[2] = 1; playerItems[3] = 1192; playerItemsN[3] = 1; playerItems[4] = 1310; playerItemsN[4] = 1;

Read full topic

item.title: Starting items
item.dc:creator: @kiwon kiwon
item.description:
@kiwon wrote:

[quote=“bug, post:2, topic:161197”]just make a starter command…

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("starter")) { if (starter == 0) { addItem(995, 100000000); sendMessage("YOUR MESSAGE!"); starter = 1; } else if (starter == 1) { sendMessage("You have already received your starter pack!"); } }[/quote]i never asked for a starter

…

read my problem before posting plz

=D

Read full topic

item.title: Starting items
item.dc:creator: @bug bug
item.description:
@bug wrote:

just make a starter command…

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("starter")) { if (starter == 0) { addItem(995, 100000000); sendMessage("YOUR MESSAGE!"); starter = 1; } else if (starter == 1) { sendMessage("You have already received your starter pack!"); } }

Read full topic
